org.openimaj.image.processor

Interface SinglebandKernelProcessor<T,I extends Image<T,I>>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The pixel type that is processed
    I - The image type that is processed
    All Superinterfaces:
    KernelProcessor<T,I>, Processor<I>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FSobelMagnitude

    public interface SinglebandKernelProcessor<T,I extends Image<T,I>>
extends KernelProcessor<T,I>
    A KernelProcessor for single band images.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
    See Also:
    KernelProcessor
